original_text: That is what the Lord did. Great numbers of flies came into Pharaoh's house and into his servants' houses. The flies went all over Egypt and they destroyed the whole land.
korean_text: 여호와께서 그와 같이 하시니 무수한 파리가 바로의 궁과 그의 신하의 집과 애굽 온 땅에 이르니 파리로 말미암아 그 땅이 황폐하였더라

sentences.original_text: That is what the Lord did.
Great numbers of flies came into Pharaoh's house
The flies went all over Egypt
and they destroyed the whole land.
